.mwm-mini-wave,.mwm-mini-waves{font-family:Open Sans,Helvetica,Sans-Serif;line-height:1}.mwm-mini-wave *,.mwm-mini-wave :after,.mwm-mini-wave :before,.mwm-mini-waves *,.mwm-mini-waves :after,.mwm-mini-waves :before{box-sizing:border-box}.mwm-mini-wave{height:3.231em;border-radius:.577em;border:.192em solid hsla(0,0%,100%,.6);background-color:#fff;opacity:1;padding:0 2.5em 0 .962em;color:#fff;display:flex;align-items:center;text-decoration:none;font-family:TempoStd,Tempo,Helvetica,Sans-Serif;text-transform:uppercase;font-size:20px;line-height:1em;letter-spacing:.027em}.mwm-mini-wave--white{background:#fff;color:#12569d}.mwm-mini-wave--white .mwm-mini-wave__close{background:url("data:image/png;base64,") no-repeat}.mwm-mini-wave--blue{background:#12569d}.mwm-mini-wave--red{background:#ce082e}.mwm-mini-wave--red img,.mwm-mini-wave--white img{position:relative}.mwm-mini-wave--red-chart img,.mwm-mini-wave--white-chart img{width:1.885em;height:1.269em;top:-.115em;left:-.308em}.mwm-mini-wave--red-clock img,.mwm-mini-wave--white-clock img{width:.962em;height:1em;top:-.038em;left:.154em}.mwm-mini-wave--red-eye img,.mwm-mini-wave--white-eye img{width:1.769em;height:1.077em;top:-.192em;left:-.154em}.mwm-mini-wave--red-star img,.mwm-mini-wave--white-star img{width:1.154em;height:1.077em;top:-.115em;position:relative}.mwm-mini-wave--hide,.mwm-mini-wave--reveal{animation-duration:1s;animation-fill-mode:both}.mwm-mini-wave--reveal{animation-name:bounceInUp;display:flex}.mwm-mini-wave--reveal .mwm-mini-wave__close{display:block}.mwm-mini-wave--hide{animation-name:bounceOutDown}.mwm-mini-wave--hide .mwm-mini-wave__close{display:none}.mwm-mini-wave--mobile{border:0 none;margin:0;border-radius:0;opacity:1}.mwm-mini-wave--mobile.mwm-mini-wave--reveal{animation-name:slideInDown}.mwm-mini-wave--mobile.mwm-mini-wave--hide{animation-name:slideOutUp}.mwm-mini-wave__icon{margin:0 .769em 0 0;width:1.192em;display:flex;justify-content:flex-start;align-items:center}.mwm-mini-wave__close{height:20px;width:20px;background:url("data:image/png;base64,") no-repeat;background-size:cover;position:absolute;right:.769em;top:calc(50% - 10px)}@keyframes bounceInUp{0%,60%,75%,90%,to{animation-timing-function:cubic-bezier(.215,.61,.355,1)}0%{opacity:0;transform:translate3d(0,3000px,0);visibility:visible}60%{opacity:1;transform:translate3d(0,-20px,0)}75%{transform:translate3d(0,10px,0)}90%{transform:translate3d(0,-5px,0)}to{transform:translateZ(0)}}@keyframes bounceOutDown{20%{transform:translate3d(0,10px,0)}40%,45%{opacity:1;transform:translate3d(0,-20px,0)}to{opacity:0;transform:translate3d(0,2000px,0);visibility:hidden}}@keyframes slideInDown{0%{transform:translate3d(0,-100%,0);visibility:visible}to{transform:translateZ(0)}}@keyframes slideOutUp{0%{transform:translateZ(0)}to{visibility:hidden;transform:translate3d(0,-100%,0)}}.mwm-mini-waves{position:relative;width:100%;max-width:960px;height:0;margin:0 auto}.mwm-mini-waves *{box-sizing:border-box}.mwm-mini-wave{position:absolute;z-index:1}.mwm-mini-wave .mwm-mini-wave__icon img{display:block!important}.mwm-mini-wave--left:nth-of-type(2n){margin-left:-1em;margin-right:-1em;margin-top:-4.25em}.mwm-mini-wave--mobile{font-family:Tempo,Tempo-Local,sans-serif;left:0;top:-100%;width:100%}
